statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity > 50 ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT device_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity > 40 ORDER BY sensor_id
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature'
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors ORDER BY reading DESC
SELECT AVG(reading) AS avg_reading FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Zone A'
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM sensors GROUP BY device_id
SELECT * FROM ai_models WHERE accuracy > 0.9 ORDER BY last_trained ASC
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_type, location, reading FROM sensors ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT model_name, description FROM ai_models WHERE accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT sensor_type, location, reading, reading_timestamp FROM sensors WHERE device_id = 100 ORDER BY reading DESC;
SELECT model_name, trained_on_device_id, accuracy, last_trained FROM ai_models ORDER BY last_trained ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE data_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_name, data_type FROM sensors WHERE location LIKE '%Room%';
SELECT device_name, prediction_result FROM devices JOIN predictions ON devices.device_id = predictions.device_id;
SELECT sensor_name, data_value FROM sensors ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, data_type, timestamp FROM sensors WHERE location = 'RoomA' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT sensors.sensor_name, devices.device_name, predictions.prediction_result FROM sensors INNER JOIN devices ON sensors.sensor_id = devices.sensor_id INNER JOIN predictions ON devices.device_id = predictions.device_id;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(data_value) AS avg_data_value FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(predictions.prediction_id) AS prediction_count FROM devices LEFT JOIN predictions ON devices.device_id = predictions.device_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM sensors WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE device_id = 'abc-123' ORDER BY device_name;
SELECT description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE log_id = 'xyz-456';
SELECT location_name, address FROM locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'Office%' ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, device_id, sensor_type, timestamp, value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(sensor_id) AS sensor_count FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING COUNT(sensor_id) > 100 ORDER BY sensor_count DESC;
SELECT sensors.sensor_id, sensors.timestamp, maintenance_logs.description FROM sensors JOIN maintenance_logs ON sensors.device_id = maintenance_logs.device_id WHERE sensors.value > 50;
SELECT device_id, device_name, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM device_information WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung';
SELECT reading_id, sensor_id, value FROM sensor_reading ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT type_name, unit FROM sensor_type WHERE type_id = 3;
SELECT result_id, prediction_value, prediction_timestamp FROM prediction_results WHERE prediction_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_information WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM sensor_reading GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(value) > 75;
SELECT device_name, location, manufacturer FROM device_information JOIN sensor_data ON device_information.device_id = sensor_data.device_id;
SELECT type_name, COUNT(reading_id) AS total_readings FROM sensor_type LEFT JOIN sensor_reading ON sensor_type.type_id = sensor_reading.sensor_id GROUP BY type_name;
